'''Ari-ari''' {{kana|アリ アリ}} is generally the most commonly accepted [[Rule variations|ruleset]] pertaining to [[Japanese mahjong]].  The two instances of "ari" (or "on") applies to the rules of [[kuitan]] and [[atozuke]].

== Game settings ==
* [[Agariyame]] - Nashi
* [[Atamahane]] - Nashi
* [[Atozuke]] - Ari
* [[Kuikae]] - Nashi
* [[Kuitan]] - Ari
* [[Tobi]] - Ari

===Dora===
* [[Akadora]] - Variable
* [[Kandora]]
* [[Uradora]] - Ari
